actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for judicial review by providers and others of actions undertaken pursuant to titles XVIII and XIX of such act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs a hearing of right with the Provider Reimbursement Review Board to any provider of service under titles XVIII and XIX (Medicare and State Medical Assistance Programs) who has filed a required cost report within the time specified and whose complaint falls within specified reviewable subject areas. Outlines the procedure to be used at a hearing and permits judicial review of any final decision of the Board. Outlines the composition of the Board and authorizes it to engage such technical assistance as may be required to carry out its functions . Makes conforming amendments to the Social Security Act concerning the rulemaking authority conferred upon the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for judicial review by providers and others of actions undertaken pursuant to titles XVIII and XIX of such act, and for other purposes.
